name: European Adventure
description: A two-week tour through Western Europe covering iconic cities and landmarks.

destinations.name: Paris
destinations.notes: Visit Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, Notre-Dame Cathedral

destinations.name: Brussels
destinations.notes: Grand Place, Atomium, Belgian chocolates

destinations.name: Amsterdam
destinations.notes: Canal tours, Van Gogh Museum, Anne Frank House

destinations.name: Berlin
destinations.notes: Brandenburg Gate, Berlin Wall Memorial, Museum Island

destinations.name: Prague
destinations.notes: Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, Old Town Square

destinations.name: Vienna
destinations.notes: Schönbrunn Palace, St. Stephen's Cathedral, Vienna Opera

name: US West Coast Road Trip
description: Epic road trip along the Pacific Coast from Seattle to San Diego.

destinations.name: Seattle
destinations.notes: Space Needle, Pike Place Market, coffee culture

destinations.name: Portland
destinations.notes: Powell's Books, food trucks, craft breweries

destinations.name: San Francisco
destinations.notes: Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz, cable cars

destinations.name: Los Angeles
destinations.notes: Hollywood, Santa Monica Pier, Getty Center

destinations.name: San Diego
destinations.notes: Balboa Park, San Diego Zoo, La Jolla beaches

name: Japan Highlights
description: Explore the blend of ancient traditions and modern innovation across Japan.

destinations.name: Tokyo
destinations.notes: Shibuya Crossing, Senso-ji Temple, Tokyo Skytree

destinations.name: Hakone
destinations.notes: Hot springs, Mount Fuji views, Lake Ashi

destinations.name: Kyoto
destinations.notes: Fushimi Inari Shrine, Kinkaku-ji, Arashiyama Bamboo Grove

destinations.name: Osaka
destinations.notes: Dotonbori, Osaka Castle, street food

destinations.name: Hiroshima
destinations.notes: Peace Memorial Park, Itsukushima Shrine (Miyajima)

name: New Zealand South Island
description: Adventure through stunning landscapes, fjords, and adventure sports.

destinations.name: Christchurch
destinations.notes: Botanic Gardens, Punting on Avon River

destinations.name: Lake Tekapo
destinations.notes: Church of the Good Shepherd, stargazing

destinations.name: Queenstown
destinations.notes: Bungee jumping, Milford Sound day trip, gondola

destinations.name: Wanaka
destinations.notes: Lake Wanaka, Roy's Peak hike, That Wanaka Tree

name: Southeast Asia Backpacking
description: Budget-friendly adventure through temples, beaches, and vibrant cities.

destinations.name: Bangkok
destinations.notes: Grand Palace, Wat Pho, street food tours

destinations.name: Chiang Mai
destinations.notes: Old City temples, elephant sanctuary, night markets

destinations.name: Siem Reap
destinations.notes: Angkor Wat, Ta Prohm, Angkor Thom

destinations.name: Ho Chi Minh City
destinations.notes: War Remnants Museum, Cu Chi Tunnels, Ben Thanh Market

destinations.name: Hanoi
destinations.notes: Old Quarter, Ha Long Bay cruise, street food

destinations.name: Luang Prabang
destinations.notes: Kuang Si Falls, Buddhist temples, alms ceremony
